About

I am a PhD student in the Department of Statistics at Simon Fraser University. Currently, I work with Luke Bornn developing statistical methods for high dimensional spatiotemporal data in order to better understand problems related to basketball and other sports. Previously, I conducted research in environmental spatial statistics with Matt Heaton while completing my MS in statistics at BYU.
